title: Breakfast Egg
author: jimmythelynx
description:
Breakfast Egg 1.2
No more simple egg shapes! Tilt the egg around and watch the yolk change its rather esoteric colors. Figure out who made the egg and how it should look to decide whether you YUM the egg or YUK it away!

Module ID: breakfastEgg

Created by: jimmythelynx
Additional coding by: Danny7007 (Gamepad support, actual TP support and Autosolver)

Manual available here: https://ktane.timwi.de/HTML/Breakfast%20Egg.html
Repository: github.com/jimmythelynx/BreakfastEgg

Sounds from freesound.org:
„Comical bite and chew“ by: watsnick
„Dumping Trash in a Trash Can“ by: deleted_user_7146007
„Fried egg“ by: f_sd
